sentence: We can't control polls that will more than likely underestimate the power of Georgia's voters of color or the commentary from pundits who were wrong about Georgia in 2020 and 2021, but we can make sure Georgians learn about the record of our eventual opponent, whether it's Brian Kemp, David Perdue, or Kandiss Taylor,? said Seth Bringman, an Abrams campaign spokesman.
author: Reid Wilson
title: Republicans lead Abrams in Georgia: poll

author: Ashley Oliver
title: Georgia Poll: Brian Kemp Has Wide Lead over David Perdue in Governor's Primary

sentence: Besides Kemp and Perdue, the primary includes Republicans Catherine Davis, Kandiss Taylor and Tom Williams, who were excluded from Sunday's debate.
author: Associated Press
title: Sparks fly in Georgia GOP gubernatorial debate: Perdue adamant 2020 election was stolen

sentence: Of the remainder, most were for Kandiss Taylor, who had 3.6%.
author: Ronn Blitzer
title: Georgia gubernatorial race: Kemp leads Trump-backed Perdue in AJC poll

sentence: Third-place candidate Kandiss Taylor received four percent, and 15 percent of respondents said they were undecided.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Georgia Poll: Kemp Widens Lead over Perdue in Governor's Primary

sentence: CLICK HERE TO GET THE FOX NEWS APP Besides Perdue, Kemp is also facing primary challenges from three lesser-known candidates - Catherine Davis, Kandiss Taylor, and Tom Williams.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Georgia GOP gubernatorial clash: Kemp brings in big bucks as he faces Trump-backed challenge from Perdue
